00024 #ifndef CCAN_JSON_H
00025 #define CCAN_JSON_H
00026 
00027 #include <stdbool.h>
00028 #include <stddef.h>
00029 
00030 typedef enum {
00031   JSON_NULL,
00032   JSON_BOOL,
00033   JSON_STRING,
00034   JSON_NUMBER,
00035   JSON_ARRAY,
00036   JSON_OBJECT,
00037 } JsonTag;
00038 
00039 typedef struct JsonNode JsonNode;
00040 
00041 struct JsonNode
00042 {
00043   /* only if parent is an object or array (NULL otherwise) */
00044   JsonNode *parent;
00045   JsonNode *prev, *next;
00046   
00047   /* only if parent is an object (NULL otherwise) */
00048   char *key; /* Must be valid UTF-8. */
00049   
00050   JsonTag tag;
00051   union {
00052     /* JSON_BOOL */
00053     bool bool_;
00054     
00055     /* JSON_STRING */
00056     char *string_; /* Must be valid UTF-8. */
00057     
00058     /* JSON_NUMBER */
00059     double number_;
00060     
00061     /* JSON_ARRAY */
00062     /* JSON_OBJECT */
00063     struct {
00064       JsonNode *head, *tail;
00065     } children;
00066   };
00067 };
00068 
00069 /*** Encoding, decoding, and validation ***/
00070 
00071 JsonNode   *json_decode         (const char *json);
00072 char       *json_encode         (const JsonNode *node);
00073 char       *json_encode_string  (const char *str);
00074 char       *json_stringify      (const JsonNode *node, const char *space);
00075 void        json_delete         (JsonNode *node);
00076 
00077 bool        json_validate       (const char *json);
00078 
00079 /*** Lookup and traversal ***/
00080 
00081 JsonNode   *json_find_element   (JsonNode *array, int index);
00082 JsonNode   *json_find_member    (JsonNode *object, const char *key);
00083 
00084 JsonNode   *json_first_child    (const JsonNode *node);
00085 
00086 #define json_foreach(i, object_or_array)            \
00087   for ((i) = json_first_child(object_or_array);   \
00088      (i) != NULL;                               \
00089      (i) = (i)->next)
00090 
00091 /*** Construction and manipulation ***/
00092 
00093 JsonNode *json_mknull(void);
00094 JsonNode *json_mkbool(bool b);
00095 JsonNode *json_mkstring(const char *s);
00096 JsonNode *json_mknumber(double n);
00097 JsonNode *json_mkarray(void);
00098 JsonNode *json_mkobject(void);
00099 
00100 void json_append_element(JsonNode *array, JsonNode *element);
00101 void json_prepend_element(JsonNode *array, JsonNode *element);
00102 void json_append_member(JsonNode *object, const char *key, JsonNode *value);
00103 void json_prepend_member(JsonNode *object, const char *key, JsonNode *value);
00104 
00105 void json_remove_from_parent(JsonNode *node);
00106 
00107 /*** Debugging ***/
00108 
00109 /*
00110  * Look for structure and encoding problems in a JsonNode or its descendents.
00111  *
00112  * If a problem is detected, return false, writing a description of the problem
00113  * to errmsg (unless errmsg is NULL).
00114  */
00115 bool json_check(const JsonNode *node, char errmsg[256]);
00116 
00117 #endif
